bike.description: Fuji A2-SL Aluminum custom butted and aero shaped, Integrated Head Tube, Double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji A2-SL Aluminum butted aero seat stays with shaped ride tuned chainstay, Fuji forged road dropout with replaceable derailleur hanger
